text: Haman aba Jisasɨ dɨ abacivavɨmalɨ. Muŋagalinu human limu sɨkuala human limu akica cɨjɨŋ agɨlaŋ iamɨgali pabiŋ agadɨ lɨbevɨmalɨ uavɨmalɨ. Lɨbidɨbiŋ nɨbɨlaŋ sɨkasɨkan haman haba hɨmavɨmalɨ uavɨmalɨ. Mufi kulaŋ iamɨgali hɨmavɨmalɨ agɨlaŋ cɨku hɨki iakɨbalɨhavi uavɨmalɨ. Hadɨku muŋagalinu hɨmavɨmalɨ agɨlaŋ aveji hɨki iakɨbalɨhavi uavɨmalɨ. Hɨki iakavɨci iamɨgali agaŋ ani dɨ idunu amɨŋ hɨnibali uavɨmalɨ.
